attributes.review: this app is disgusting. it hacked my phone and took my bank information only to buy 50 dildos and mail them to my family members. imagine what i had to go through explaining that to them.
attributes.title: EW

attributes.review: I climbed out of my head and watched myself implode a thought without a body Aught to be the shot to take a load off my brain there’s poison and I’m searching for the antidote but every time I find it my defense is screaming no you don’t woah.
attributes.title: Acab

attributes.review: Hi, i’m here to say this app is not at all what it seems. Trump supporters.. listen. This app will manipulate you to do things not in your intention. For legal reasons i cannot go into detail. Please, for your sake and your family/friends sake, don’t get this terrible app.
attributes.title: Oh my.

attributes.review: This app was so stupid it made my smart phone jump out of my pocket but a gun (it was easy for it to do because we have no gun control) and then proceed to shoot itself causing me to have to buy a new phone. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: Made my phone overheat to the point where it didn’t turn back on for 15 minutes. Melted the center of my phone case due to the app overheating my phone. Would rate 0/5 if I could.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: The representation is horrible , very confusing not helpful at all (sorry bad English) we should have a option to change the apps language for us who don’t know English that well 💕💕 for us Hispanic supporters 😩😩. Therefore, goodbye ❤️
attributes.title: Defund Ice

attributes.review: I opened the app after having woken up from the best nap I have ever had only to see a Cheeto  puff with a turkey neck on my screen. ruined my day completely and I am now utterly disgusted, will be deleting soon.✨
attributes.title: just trash in general

attributes.review: This app is just the worst thing ever.  As soon as I opened the app there was this weird Cheeto man.  I don’t want to describe what he was doing because it was just too unpleasant and their may be kids reading this.  This app made me ashamed of our president.
attributes.title: WHAT!!!!!!!????????!!!???!!?

And to all supporters who are white supremaced, anti-Jew, anti-immigrant and anti-black and who probably jack off to his racist comments. Bernie 2020!
